metadata.Description: A system aimed at eliminating waste and promoting the continual use of resources.

level 1.Description: The circular economy implements sustainable production practices that minimize waste and maximize resource efficiency.
The circular economy funds the development and implementation of innovative recycling technologies to promote a closed-loop system.
The circular economy focuses on waste reduction strategies to minimize the environmental impact of resource consumption.
The circular economy operates in sustainable supply chains to ensure the responsible sourcing and management of resources.
The circular economy partners with businesses and industries to drive the adoption of sustainable practices and circular business models.
The circular economy contributes to climate change mitigation by reducing greenhouse gas emissions through resource efficiency and waste reduction.
The circular economy monitors resource consumption to identify opportunities for improvement and optimize resource management.
The circular economy targets specific circularity metrics to measure progress and drive continuous improvement in resource management.
